name: Snaky water
description:
Rules

  • Please play the game full screen
  • Get the longuest water tail possible.
  • Collect blue circles to gain more drops
  • Avoid hot red squares to prevent your tail to get vaporised.
  • Keep your mouse in move or the gravity will have rid of your water tail.

YOU CAN LEAVE THE GAME ANY TIME BY PRESSING ESCAPE (actually does not seem to work on itch :-/ )

How was it done ?

Done in a bit more than 1h (but I did a really unefficient work on it) for the weekly one hour gamejam.

I didn't actually tested it a lot in a browser. I hope it's not too heavy for computer's memory.

Last Update : 21/02/2017 : credits clarification
